feed.title: DISI UniBo NLP
feed.subtitle: The DISI Unibo Natural Language Understanding Group (DISI Unibo NLU), led by prof. Gianluca Moro, includes a large team of Ph.D. students and researchers which are part of the Department of Computer Science and Engineering (DISI) of the University of Bologna.

entry.title: COLING 2022
entry.content: We are proud to announce that our group will be at COLING 2022 with two accepted long papers in the main track.
entry.summary: We are proud to announce that our group will be at COLING 2022 with two accepted long papers in the main track.

entry.title: AAAI 2022
entry.content: We are proud to announce that our group will be at AAAI 2022 with an accepted paper in the main track on low-resource document summarization.
entry.summary: We are proud to announce that our group will be at AAAI 2022 with an accepted paper in the main track on low-resource document summarization.
